Articles.Content: Danger Alerts! Adds alerts that trigger when you’re in danger. It also adds a simple interface that let’s you silence, or modify exactly when the alarm goes off. Currently, the mod is fairly simple and only has one alarm, the “ground collision” alarm, however the plan is to add more alarms. By Norpo
I'm very excited to see what comes out of this.

Heya; I made Danger Alerts. Glad to see people like my small mod so far, it's good to see people are interested in the mod!  The mod is fairly simple right now, but more features are coming Soontm, currently I'm working on a more sophisticated GUI; and low fuel/electric charge/life support (if modded) alerts. All toggleable through options, of course.

I'm always accepting suggestions for features, and constructive criticism; and would love to hear any you may have.

Two questions:

1. Is it an auditory alarm or a visual one?  The thread needs a video.

2. If auditory, does it have a feminine British accent?  Because I think that's some kind of law for space games now.

"Warning: Landing Gear Not Deployed"

"Warning: Heat Critical"

"Frameshift Charge Detected".... oops wrong game.

Seriously, it looks interesting but #1 was a real inquiry.

I might add some other visual cue (someone suggested adding red lights to the IVA; no idea if that's easy, or even possible though), if I can figure out a way to add another visual cue; and keep it relatively non-intrusive, I'll probably add it. I would add a video but the mod will likely change quite a bit in future releases; If I do add a video it will be after I add a better GUI and possibly other alerts. This mod looks fun! I'll try it out.

Maybe for a visual a flashing red border around the screen.  You've seen it in a million games, nothing too flashy, but like 10-20 pixels wide with increasing opacity towards the center of the screen.

Anything graphical is definitely not an area within my expertise, though, so maybe that's impossible within KSP.
